```{r}
library(httr)
library(xml2)
library(rvest)
library(data.table)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggmap)
library(mapproj)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
url <- "http://blog.xuite.net/tcchian/travel/44752953"

MRT <- list()
doc <- read_html(url)
MRT[[7]] <- html_table(html_nodes(doc, "#content_all > table:nth-child(39)"), fill = TRUE)[[1]]

for(i in 1:7){
  MRT[[i]] <- MRT[[i]][-1,]
}
MRT.df <- rbindlist(MRT)

```
